title: Great Expecations - Twin Dragons
overview: Set in the early 1900s in Tianjin, it follows the adventures of mob boss Huo Tian Hong's estranged son, Huo Zhen Xiao, and Chen Zheng, who he meets in prison. The two young men, who come from very different backgrounds, have to learn to work together and cooperate as they navigate the dangerous waters of prison.
